title: Engraved looking serif font Wallpaper\* Magazine
content:
Hello,

I'm struggling with finding the name of this typeface.  
The font is used for the Wallpaper\* Magazine: Design Awards 2014.

[http://www.wallpaper.com/v2/commercial/wbespoke/design-awards-2014](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317102515/http:/www.wallpaper.com/v2/commercial/wbespoke/design-awards-2014)

Thanks in advance!

N.

Font: 

 Portrait Inline Regular 

Solved By: 

 [akira1975](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317102515/http:/typophile.com/user/4504 "View user profile.")
